thread.title: Neil Diamond Says He Has Parkinson’s, Will Retire From Touring

author: wsjcom
title: Neil Diamond Says He Has Parkinson’s, Will Retire From Touring
text:
NEW YORK—Neil Diamond is retiring from touring after he said he has been diagnosed with Parkinson’s disease.
Days shy of his 77th birthday, the rock legend is canceling March tour dates in Australia and New Zealand. He was on his 50th anniversary tour.
The Rock and Roll Hall of Famer offered his “sincerest apologies” to those who planned to... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
